title: That White People Shit
overview: Comedian King Keraun Harris is on a journey of discovery, pulling back the curtain on a variety of subcultures that are particular to the white community. Join King Keraun as he fully immerses himself in white culture like fencing, LARPing, slack lining, alpaca farming, and ghost hunting. Along the way, he meets new friends and makes it his mission is to understand why white people do what they do, and love what they do.
